results.title: Donor Simvastatin Treatment in Heart Transplantation.
results.text_hl: METHODS: Eighty-four multiorgan donors were randomly assigned to receive 80 mg of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ (42 donors) via nasogastric tube after declaration of @<m>DISEASE_Brain_Death</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001926 @@@brain death@@@ and upon acceptance as a cardiac donor, or to receive no @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ (42 donors).

citations.NLM: Nykänen AI, Holmström EJ, Tuuminen R, Krebs R, Dhaygude K, Kankainen M, Jokinen JJ, Lommi J, Helanterä I, Räisänen-Sokolowski A, Syrjälä SO, Lemström KB. Donor Simvastatin Treatment in Heart Transplantation. Circulation. 2019 Aug 20;140(8):627-640. PMID: 31352795
